subject: Automobile Racing
Economic Conditions and Trends
lead_paragraph: As Formula One prepares for its third night race in Singapore this weekend, experts says its health has never been better, with the sport forced by the financial crisis to restructure in a more solid manner.
snippet: As Formula One prepares for its third night race in Singapore this weekend, experts says its health has never been better, with the sport forced by the financial crisis to restructure in a more solid manner.
